message.body: Good job taking care of yourself. You are a warrior. I'm glad you can have a little relief. Yes, rest. And anti-inflammatory can't hurt though I know it'
s no magic pill either. Keep me posted on what the ped says. Here if you need me.
Just checking in on how you're feeling. I hope you've found a bit of relief today. Let me know if you need anything.
Poop-wise... ####'s making up for lost time, & I did it virtually painlessly this am. Things are looking up! My mom's here & cleaning & helping out for the day.
Fantastic news all the way around! Milk going strong, nipples hanging in?
